properties.name: spring.ai.alibaba.mem0.client.base-url
properties.description: Base URL for the Mem0 client service.

properties.name: spring.ai.alibaba.mem0.client.timeout-seconds
properties.description: Timeout in seconds for client operations.

properties.name: spring.ai.alibaba.mem0.client.max-retry-attempts
properties.description: Maximum number of retry attempts for failed operations.

properties.name: spring.ai.alibaba.mem0.server.version
properties.description: Version of the Mem0 server to connect to.

properties.name: spring.ai.alibaba.mem0.server.vector-store.provider
properties.description: Provider for the vector store (e.g., qdrant, chroma, pgvector, pinecone, mongodb, milvus, baidu, upstash_vector, azure_ai_search, redis, elasticsearch, vertex_ai_vector_search, opensearch, supabase, weaviate, faiss, langchain).

properties.name: spring.ai.alibaba.mem0.server.vector-store.config
properties.description: Configuration map for the vector store provider.

properties.name: spring.ai.alibaba.mem0.server.graph-store.provider
properties.description: Provider for the graph store.

properties.name: spring.ai.alibaba.mem0.server.graph-store.config.url
properties.description: URL for the graph store connection.

properties.name: spring.ai.alibaba.mem0.server.graph-store.config.username
properties.description: Username for the graph store authentication.

properties.name: spring.ai.alibaba.mem0.server.graph-store.config.password
properties.description: Password for the graph store authentication.

properties.name: spring.ai.alibaba.mem0.server.graph-store.config.database
properties.description: Database name for Neo4j graph store.

properties.name: spring.ai.alibaba.mem0.server.graph-store.config.base-label
properties.description: Base label setting for Neo4j graph store.

properties.name: spring.ai.alibaba.mem0.server.graph-store.custom-prompt
properties.description: Custom prompt template for graph store operations.

properties.name: spring.ai.alibaba.mem0.server.llm.provider
properties.description: Provider for the LLM service.

properties.name: spring.ai.alibaba.mem0.server.llm.config.api-key
properties.description: API key for the LLM service.

properties.name: spring.ai.alibaba.mem0.server.llm.config.temperature
properties.description: Temperature setting for LLM responses.

properties.name: spring.ai.alibaba.mem0.server.llm.config.model
properties.description: Model name for the LLM service.

properties.name: spring.ai.alibaba.mem0.server.llm.config.openai-base-url
properties.description: Base URL for OpenAI-compatible services.

properties.name: spring.ai.alibaba.mem0.server.embedder.provider
properties.description: Provider for the embedding service.

properties.name: spring.ai.alibaba.mem0.server.embedder.config.api-key
properties.description: API key for the embedding service.

properties.name: spring.ai.alibaba.mem0.server.embedder.config.model
properties.description: Model name for the embedding service.

properties.name: spring.ai.alibaba.mem0.server.embedder.config.openai-base-url
properties.description: Base URL for OpenAI-compatible embedding services.

properties.name: spring.ai.alibaba.mem0.server.history-db-path
properties.description: Path to the history database.

properties.name: spring.ai.alibaba.mem0.server.project.custom-categories
properties.description: Custom categories for the project.

properties.name: spring.ai.alibaba.mem0.server.project.custom-instructions
properties.description: Custom instructions for the project.

properties.name: spring.ai.alibaba.mem0.server.custom-fact-extraction-prompt
properties.description: Custom prompt for fact extraction.

properties.name: spring.ai.alibaba.mem0.server.custom-update-memory-prompt
properties.description: Custom prompt for memory updates.
